text: Feeding America is a United Statesâ€“based non-profit organization. They have over 200 food banks that feed more than 46 million people through food pantries, soup kitchens and shelters. Forbes ranks it as the largest U.S. charity by revenue. Feeding America was known as America's Second Harvest until August 31, 2008. ==References== Category:Non-profit organizations of the United States
title: Feeding America
